body:
Hi all,


I have tried installing Daysim 4.0 version but when I select the export
option for Daysim analysis in Ecotect - a window flashes and disappears
instantly. I have tried downloading the lower version 3.1 which comes along
with a flash plugin in daysim website. This neither works and while
installing it asks for a second disk as unable to locate the correct
pathway. I am unclear what that supposed to be.


Anyone using Daysim latest versions please help me. I appreciate quick
response.


Kind regards,
Varma
Research Associate
